isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - CAB DOOR VENT WINDOW

svcsubproc.title: Remove Cab Door Vent Window on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 48 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Open cab door vent window (Item 1). Remove two torx head screws (Item 2) from vent window latch pivot (Item 3) and cab door vent window frame (Item 4), driver side shown.

With cab door vent window (Item 1) still open, swing it out away from cab door vent window opening until the upper cab door vent window hinge (Item 5, View Circle A) is accessible. Use a flat blade screw driver and carefully push the upper cab door vent window hinge up off the upper cab door vent window mounting pin (Item 6, View Circle A). Once the cab door vent window is free at the top, lift lower cab door vent window mounting pin (Item 7, View Circle B) out of the lower cab door vent window hinge (Item 8, View Circle B) and remove from cab door (Item 9), driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.
Repeat procedure to remove passenger side cab door vent window.

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. UPPER CAB DOOR VENT WINDOW HINGE
6. UPPER CAB DOOR VENT WINDOW MOUNTING PIN
7. LOWER CAB DOOR VENT WINDOW MOUNTING PIN
8. LOWER CAB DOOR VENT WINDOW HINGE
